name: New England Republic
startIntroPart2: You, President Maura Healy, are the leader of the New England Republic, encompassing Massachusetts, Maine, Vermont, Rhode Island, New Hampshire, and Connecticut.  After winning independence from America, you must now lead your nation to prosperity!
declaringWar: You have crossed my people one too many times. Now, prepare to be destroyed like the you have. never seen before
attacked: Your army fighting my army is like bringing a knife to a gunfight. After we win the war, you will be exiled, and forced to live away from any civilization, as an outcast.
defeated: We may have fallen, but the Republic will still crush you.
introduction: Hello. I am President Maura Healy, of New England.  I welcome you to our land.  Would you like to play a game of soccer?
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
